full_summary:
**TSPS 3.11 Communications Consultant - English**

### Tender Details
#### Solicitation Number
* 5000074155
#### Tender Details URL
* <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/buyers/elections-and-tenders/tenders/show/6820/task-based-npp-5000074155-en.pdf>

The Corporate Management Directorate (CMD) of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking a communications consultant to provide professional writing and editing services. The consultant will assist in the development of ECCC’s annual reporting and planning documents.

### Tender Status
* Expired - 2023-07-17T14:00:00

### Contract Duration
* Contract Start Date: 2023-08-01
* Contract End Date: 2023-03-31

### Evaluation Criteria
The bid will be evaluated based on the combined score of technical merit and price. The bidder must provide a detailed proposal that outlines their qualifications, experience, and approach to the project.

### Place of Work
* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Across Canada

### Establishment Contact
* Contracting Authority: Environment and Climate Change Canada
* Contracting Address: 351 St-Joseph Blvd., Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0H3
* Contracting Telephone: (819) 307-1927
* Contracting Email: [carolyne.chenier@ec.gc.ca](mailto:carolyne.chenier@ec.gc.ca)

### Trade Agreements
This procurement may be open to tenderers that are certified under the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

Please note that this is not an exhaustive list, and the contract may be subject to other trade agreements as well. Bidders are encouraged to verify the information with the contracting authority.

### Key Notes
* The tender notice and all supporting documentation can be found at the Canada Buys website listed above.
* Bidders must submit their proposal electronically through the Government of Canada Tenders website. ### Notes de clôture
* Le présent avis du ministère et tous les documents annexés peuvent être consultés sur le site CanadaAchete.ca.
* Les postulants doivent soumet
